name: Impress the Keeper of Forbidden Lore
fiction1: The thawing of Boar's Pass brought Elisa, hierophant of the Blue Robes, to Brightdune. Ringed by her retinue of blue clad wizards, she addressed her audience.
fiction2: 'I received Thea's message. Burgan Vale can provide aid - yet we have concerns. Can we trust you with our secrets from the Tower of Arankh? Will you respect the Veil of Magic?'
question1: How do you gain Elisa's trust?
twist1: Elisa is a potion crafter and channeler from Burgan Vale
twist2: The people of Burgan Vale tend to be reserved in speech and manner
resolution1: 'Very well - you have our aid. Travel to Arankh, where Yasmina is waiting for you. She is one of our brightest adepts and has been researching the source of the Autarch's magic.'

name: Find the Location of Thedda's Palimpsest
fiction1: Yasmina smiled. 'Hi! I've been expecting you. Oh yes, for sure, you've got big problems. Do you understand the seven aetheric side-effects of transplanar channeling? No? Wow.'
fiction2: 'Okay, then, well, I think Thedda's Palimpsest is the best way for you to defend against this magic. Somewhere in these 1001 tomes is a reference to its location. Let's get to work!'
question1: How do you help Yasmina find where the Palimpsest is hidden?
twist1: The most ancient books are locked with runes of mind blasting
twist2: Other books in the sprawling library are written in forgotten tongues
resolution1: 'Yes! I think you've found it! Well done! I should've guessed the necromancer Undari hid it away in his tower somewhere. Should be easy enough to recover. Just get past the ancient sanity blasting traps.'

name: Recover Thedda's Palimpsest
fiction1: The perfectly sane wizard Undari left all manner of traps and tricks for anyone foolhardy enough to wander his tower. Particularly well-guarded is his prized possession, Thedda's Palimpsest.
fiction2: Written in silver blood drained from the archdruid herself, the palimpsest is protected by illusions of thirst, copper worms, and frost magic.
question1: How do you survive Undari's Tower?
twist1: Frost mephits cast teeth-freeze runes as you ascend the tower
twist2: The Palimpsest is hidden amongst other nondescript books, and warded by lightning
resolution1: With the Palimpsest in hand, the work can begin to unravel the Autarch's curse. Questions remain - where is the Autarch drawing strength from, and how can she be stopped?
reward: Unlock Thedda's Palimpsest asset and Death Captured mission
